title: A Committee under the Chairmanship of Municipal Commissioner, TMC shall earmark / select the plots for public parking, on the basis of their suitability
clause_text: A Committee under the Chairmanship of Municipal Commissioner, TMC shall earmark / select the plots for public parking, on the basis of their suitability. The Committee shall comprise the following or their representatives (i) Metropolitan Commissioner, MMRDA,
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
